```{r}

data_path <- 'G:/Shared drives/Working Group - NLP in Engineering Education Research/Fall 2021 Independent Study/data/sample docs/'
setwd(data_path)
list.files()

```




```{r}
# load essays

file_name_df <- tibble(file_name = list.files(data_path))

my_files <- file_name_df$file_name

temp_files <- lapply(paste0(data_path, my_files), readtext)

names(temp_files) <- my_files

temp_sol <- bind_rows(temp_files, .id = "column_label")



temp_sol %>% write_csv("sample_text.csv")


```
